TopicTitle: Warp To Next Maneuver Node Improvements

Articles.Content:
Thank you for adding the "Warp Here" and "Warp To Next Maneuver Node" functionality! However, after using this functionality for about week now I would like to suggestion two minor tweaks:

1) It appears that the warp function simply warps to: (Node - 1 minute) Usually this is OK, but for some engines or deep-space burns this functionality isn't as helpful because of long burn times. Suggestion is to make the calculation (Node + ((Calculated Burn Time / 2) \* -1) - 1 minute)

2) The map view "Warp To Next Maneuver Node" is a little cumbersome in that you have to click on the projected path after the node to get the context menu to stay open. This is OK, but it would be really great if we could get the warp function added to the Navball where the node info for m/s already displays.

Thanks!
